attributes.action: P.C Stuart Outten to be knighted GBE and given the George Cross for his bravery
attributes.additional_details:
For the Secretary of State for Defence to recommend to the Monarch: 

Police Constable Stuart Outten to receive the George Cross & to be Knighted (GBE) for his incredible bravery in protecting the public. 

Police Constable Stuart Outten risked his life protecting the Public so should be commended with the highest honours of the land. 

P.C Outten is an inspiration 

Police Constable Outten should be afforded (GBE) so this National Hero can represent British values & freedoms at State Dinners
attributes.background: This petition is for Police Constable Stuart Outten to receive the George Cross for his selfless bravery & courage recently in Leyton. Police Constable Stuart Outten risked his life to protect the freedoms & diversity we all enjoy and take for granted. P.C Outten should also be knighted
